content:
Some of the top Colombian chefs in the US who are also influencers include:

1. Juan Manuel Barrientos: He is the chef and owner of El Cielo, a restaurant in Miami that serves contemporary Colombian cuisine. He is known for incorporating unique and unexpected ingredients into traditional Colombian dishes.
2. Catalina Vélez: She is a chef and cookbook author based in New York City. She is known for her Colombian-inspired recipes that feature fresh, seasonal ingredients and bold flavors.
3. Jaime Rodriguez: He is the executive chef at La Cosecha in Washington, D.C., a Latin American food hall that features a variety of cuisines from across the continent. His menu includes traditional Colombian dishes as well as fusion creations.
4. Alex Quesada: He is the owner of Arepa Zone, a food truck based in Washington, D.C. that serves authentic Venezuelan and Colombian arepas. He is known for using high-quality, locally sourced ingredients in his recipes.
5. Jorge Gaviria: He is the chef and owner of Antojitos Colombianos, a restaurant in Los Angeles that specializes in Colombian street food. His menu includes traditional dishes like empanadas and arepas, as well as fusion creations like Colombian-style hot dogs.
6. Sebastian Orozco: He is the owner and head chef at Toro Loco, a Colombian restaurant in Portland, Oregon. His menu features a mix of traditional and modern Colombian dishes, including seafood ceviche and slow-cooked pork.
7. Sergio Sigala: He is the executive chef at Alma Cocina Latina in Baltimore, Maryland. His menu includes a range of Latin American dishes, including several Colombian-inspired options like bandeja paisa and arroz con pollo.
8. Daniel Castaño: He is the head chef at El Balcón de las Americas in Queens, New York. His menu features a mix of Latin American cuisines, including traditional Colombian dishes like sancocho and churrasco.
9. Carlos Salazar: He is the executive chef at Riel in Houston, Texas. While his menu is not exclusively Colombian, he is known for incorporating Latin American flavors and ingredients into his dishes.
10. Luz Arango: She is the owner and head chef at Sazón Colombian Food in Jersey City, New Jersey. Her menu includes a range of traditional Colombian dishes as well as fusion creations like Colombian-style burgers and tacos.
